alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued November 19 at 3:30PM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will rise rapidly tonight and early Monday, bringing dangerously high surf to exposed north facing shores, and high surf to west facing shores. The swell will gradually diminish and turn more northerly on Tuesday. Wave heights at NDBC buoys 51001 and 51101 northwest of Kauai rose nearly 9 feet in two hours Sunday afternoon, thus a rapid increase in wave heights can be expected tonight. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves near 25 feet. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, and north facing shores of Kauai, Oahu and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High...Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Large breaking surf, significant shorebreak, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore
